website_summaries.verdict: An affordable way to improve the overall audio mix of your TV, but note that it doesn't come with a subwoofer.
pros: Easy to set up and operate
The mids and highs are very crisp and clear
Good audio mix, and it's very effective at making dialogue clearer
cons: This option doesn't come with a subwoofer, so be sure to factor that into your overall costs if it's something you need
Some buyers report that this soundbar starts making random humming, hissing, and other noises after a few months

customer_reviews.title: Avoid like the plague
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two separate sound bars from Vizio. One of them was 2.1 with sub woofer and the other was just a 2.0 for the bedroom. As of now, within two years, both of the sound bars have stopped working. First the lights would not turn off, but the units continued to work, now both of the units are dead even though the lights are still lit. I am contacting Vizio now to see if there is anything that can be done to rectify the situation. If they can, I will change my rating.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality, Worse Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: When I first turned this on, the sound quality was great. Then, mere minutes later, the great sound quality turned into loud static. Now, every time I try and use this (not even at a high volume) I almost immediately am met with static. After going to Vizio Customer Service, they strung me along for two months until telling me they can't help and I had passed my warranty. Don't waste your time or money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Selig

customer_reviews.title: Speaker stopped working properly
customer_reviews.text: The speaker doesn’t even work anymore. I just got it and it sounds splotchy and raspy. It sounds like absolute trash and the volume will not turn up or down. It sounds like a generic TV sound and I’m very disappointed. I don’t recommend this product to anyone!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marlowe

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: The sound bar only worked with bluetooth and not with the TV connection. Customer support from VIZIO had me send the bad unit to them and they sent a replacement. Same problem with the replacement, and now customer support tells me it is a problem with my (VIZIO) TV connectors. We found that the alternate (not preferred) connection type worked, so that was their solution. I told them the ON/OFF button was not working (discovered as we worked on the problem over the phone), but the remote worked. They seemed to think this was an acceptable solution. This was definitely the last VIZIO product I will ever buy.
customer_reviews.author: Cleawox

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this April 2, received april 4. Worked great until yesterday..June 24,2017. Suddenly, a loud buzz began. I have tried since then, to fix it. No luck. When I checked the return policy and the support policy, I found return expired May 4th and support expired June 4th. So I am stuck with a sound bar that won't work and no one to help. I'm out 80 bucks and I'm mad!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Shields

customer_reviews.title: stopped working after 10 months
customer_reviews.text: update: 4/30/2019: Stopped working. Worked yesterday but not today. Went thru setup again, even switched cables. Nothing. The price is too high for just ten months of use. Will not buy Vizio anything, ever. July 2018: I had trouble with the directions, which seem to apply to people that are attaching this to a Vizio t.v. which I was not. So after a struggle to figure out which cable to use, I ultimately went to YouTube and watched a 3 yr old video on setting these up and, voila, my problem was solved. It sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Kimbo

customer_reviews.title: No better than built-in speakers to my ears
customer_reviews.text: Returned it after a week because it sounded no better than the built-in speakers in my lower-end 46" Sony and Samsung LCD TVs (each cost ~$1K 4 years ago) I tried the various inputs, including the optical (from my Samsung), and I couldn't detect any quality improvement, trying a couple DVD and BluRay musicals and over-the-air. I was hoping for warm & rich, and I got thin & tinny, regardless of settings (and yes, they have settings you can adjust, but so do my TVs, And like my TVs, something is lost when you change a setting.: For example, boost the bass, and conversation sounds muddy).
customer_reviews.author: BluegrassFan

customer_reviews.title: Alright. Just don't buy for the bluetooth.
customer_reviews.text: Good little cheap soundbar. Sound quality drops off past a certain volume level, but for normal everyday use, this is not a big problem. Optic cable they provide i found to be just barely long enough for my set-up. I recommend buying a longer one. The only major problem I have had is that the bluetooth won't pair easily to your device. It's actually quite f-ing ridiculous how hard it is to pair to a device. I will literally have my phone laying on top of soundbar and they won't be able to find each other. If i would have know that, I more than likely would've gotten something else. With that being said, I give it an average rating.
customer_reviews.author: Tucker Lee Hittesdorf

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: PROS *Sounds pretty good. *Mounts nicely with the TV using a cheap mounting kit that'll be useful for other sound bars later. *It's pretty accurate from to 80Hz-19.9kHz. At this price point, that's not bad. CONS *Optical input wasn't operational on my unit. *Requires it's own remote (The vizio TV remote should operate it, IMO) *Frustrating 'Input' identification - the lights are very close together and it takes about ~5 seconds at each of 6 inputs before audio plays if you have to guess...
customer_reviews.author: D. S. West

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware - No help from Vizio
customer_reviews.text: Revised after two months of use. Sound bar worked great for two months and then started buzzing and cutting out. Just over two months and too long for Amazon's 60 day free help. Numerous attempts to call Vizio Tech Support left me holding the phone for 30 minutes at a time and never any help. I no longer recommend this item. No tech support and the website is useless as well, so buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: RE

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with this. I really can’t say much about the sound, because it was only connected for about a week after I rcvd it. If there is a break in electrical connection it has to be reconnected all over again, with my tv I have to call customer service for assistant. First call I got nowhere with rep, second time the customer service rep. was excellent.Right now it’s not synced with the tv and I don’t feel like calling again. I wish it were easier to connect. I wish I hadn’t purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: G. H.

customer_reviews.title: Good value, poor lifespan
customer_reviews.text: Set up was easy, but the app is extremely finicky. Audio quality was good, especially for the price. The satellites were just okay, but the sub and bar are great. The worst part, however, and the reason for the 1 star, is that only a month after the 1 year warranty, the bar has blown a speaker. This with very reserved use. I lived in an apartment and rarely raised the volume past half.
customer_reviews.author: Sam H

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Got this sound bar for our 50 in Vizio. Mounted it above with mounts find here on Amazon. Connected via the supplied optical cable and the sound is very good. It comes with a remote and also has buttons on the unit in case you lose the remote. The only thing I don't like is if you pause you tv for a little while, maybe 10 minutes, the sound bar shuts off... Annoying especially if you've misplaced the remote. But at least you can turn it on, unlike others I read about that use remote only. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting too much given the size of this soundbar, but was still very underwhelmed. Not only did the audio sound terrible, but the sound bar gave a constant loud white noise hiss whenever the volume was turned up near halfway, which it has to be as the speakers in the soundbar are extremely low powered. I verified it wasn't the input because the speakers still produced the hiss with no audio input connected. Even while watching an action movie as a test I could constantly hear the hissing in the background. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Made my TV so much better!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a new television around the first part of the year, and I loved everything about it but the sound quality. Like most televisions being made today, the speakers are in the back, and it sounded muffled. I thought maybe I'd adjust to it, but I didn't. This sound bar changed all of that. It installed easily with the included wires, and after adding stilts to my television stand, it slides right under the TV. It would be great if TV legs were a little taller, or sound bars were a little slimmer, but I made it work. The sound quality is 1,000 times better with this sound bar. I couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Valag

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought a new Vizio television and added the sound bar to match the name brand. It was really easy to install and comes with connection cables and wall mounts. It has a really good sound and Bluetooth connectivity is also easy to pair with devices. It comes with its own remote and switching between components is easy but you have to remember what is connected to the speaker display. Its not usually a problem for me, I just cycle through the component settings until I get to what I want.
customer_reviews.author: Texashome

customer_reviews.title: No Led Lights At All, makes for difficult Use
customer_reviews.text: I was pumped to inbox this sound bar. I followed the quick start book did everything it told me to. When I turned it in for the first time I didn’t know it was even on because none of the LED lights were working at all. Confused and trying to figure out which input I was on, I had to blindly navigate until I got it to play. Once I got it to work it sounded good! However I am disappointed and will be returning it. It was probably just a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: Ginney

customer_reviews.title: Works great with our vizio tvs
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased 3 of these, 3 different sizes for 3 tvs. All have worked fine. Really improved the sound quality available from the tv speakers. Very easy to install/connect. Just plug in the digital audio cable and power cord and it is ready for use. Use the tv remote for controlling volume. Do not even need the sound bar remote except to occasionally adjust bass/treble.
customer_reviews.author: Modeler

customer_reviews.title: Good, clear sound
customer_reviews.text: I have an older TV with a failing speaker, so I got this so I wouldn't have to buy a brand-new TV (and by old, I mean maybe 4 years old). It wasn't that simple to connect since my TV is a dinosaur in technology-years, but this came with enough cables that I was able to get it rigged up and working. It sounds great. My cable remote operates both it and the TV sound, though, so sometimes you'll get an echo because of that. I just try to make sure I only adjust the sound with the sound bar remote (which ONLY adjusts the sound bar) and leave the TV sound as low as possible.
customer_reviews.author: DenKag

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Most of the new TVs have the speaker coming out the back or bottom and to people hard of hearing the sound is muffled and the volume has to be turned up way to loud for other family members. With this sound bar it comes out the front and makes it much better for the hard of hearing. We can now keep our tv on a more comfortable volume. Would recommend for anyone, but especially for people with hearing difficulties.
customer_reviews.author: Rouse

customer_reviews.title: Sounds amazing.
customer_reviews.text: This sound bar sounds amazing. I purchased this sound bar for my father after another one I had got for him wasn't working properly. Glad I decided to go with Vizio this time around. This sound bar has many options not available on cheaper sound bar models. I can see myself getting a sub down the road for him since this bar has the port to connect one. Very pleased with this purchase. And as long as it keeps working this it's doing. I see no complaints anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick Charles Krueger

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great, super happy!
customer_reviews.text: I hesitate getting all these different addons because I have ps4 and Roku and I hate dealing with setups lol...but setup for this was really simple and the sound is super loud and it's only on volume 2 so far (trying it with Amazon music on roku). The TV sound was super weak alone but this completes everything I need in life for now :) looks nice under my new TV too. OH! I forgot to add that you can setup Bluetooth to play music from your phone through the speaker, didn't realize that when I bought it. Amazing bonus lol
customer_reviews.author: Piratekitty

customer_reviews.title: Nice simple sounding in a good smaller size
customer_reviews.text: This serves the purpose quite well for a new gaming PC I have. I didn't want a full on larger size footprint and sub. This sounds very good for my simpler needs. My other options are headphones and my full on media center. The sound is smooth, has some bass and not too bright. Kind of middle of the road. I have other 2.1 and 3.1 options but again if you have simpler needs this unit will do the trick. I have not tried the BT function.
customer_reviews.author: W. Dyer

customer_reviews.title: may have to change tv settings to get sound to come through. Great audio and design.
customer_reviews.text: Just got and hooked this up yesterday. We use the optical cord supplied with it. I was surprised to see it came with a wall mount. It took some effort in changing my TV settings to have the sound come through the bar but I've gotten it to the point that I can use my regular remote to turn it on and off and volume up and down. Sound is great, and it can be very loud we only have the volume up 2 notches for regular use. Love it and it looks really good with our TV and stand.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Hurley

customer_reviews.title: If only the sound were as crisp as pictures ...
customer_reviews.text: AARGH!!!!! Television dialogue is muffled -- almost no matter what. I've read that most of the engineering goes into picture production (video) and that audio is a stepchild in digital media. Well, I agree. We fiddled with the audio settings on the TV, to no avail. Then we bought this. It HELPS because it projects the audio in front of the television (Some speakers go to the back or sides). However. STILL INADEQUATE SOUND QUALITY. I'm an experienced speech reader (AKA lip reader), and even though my hearing corrects to very normal, I still can't make out the speech from the television a lot of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Reader

customer_reviews.title: Looks more expensive than it is....
customer_reviews.text: Relativly easy to install , when adjusted correctly dialogue is much easier to understand. Use the auto search feature on the remote to complete installation. Note: it appears there used to be a feature that allowed the user to sync the sound bar to ANY tv remote so the tv remote could control the volume of the bar. That feature is no longer present (there are no instructions in the start book to do this) and volume must be adjusted with the sound bar remote.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Opt for something better
customer_reviews.text: Just not what I expected. The sound is not good at all. I actually preferred the speakers from the TV better. I have a vizio sound bar for my TV in the living room and I actually love it. It has a sub woofer and it's nice. This however does not. I connected it to a Vizio 55 inch smart tv ,for the bedroom. It gets loud but there's no depth to the sound. Also with the surround sound like setting, there's an annoying echo of some sort. I should have returned it but I didn't. I definitely do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: IamNoble

customer_reviews.title: Better than TV sound
customer_reviews.text: My issue may actually be with the input device, my Vizio TV and Netflix. Sometimes while watching Netflix I have to mess with the audio settings to get clear spoken audio that's not overly loud with sound effects or music. It's not really meant to handle bass and easily distorts when there's a lot of bass, esp when using the different audio boost settings. I'm connected through the optical cable provided with the setup. I also needed to prop my TV up on a couple wood blocks because this speaker bar stands just a tad too high when sitting in front of the TV with the TV on the stock feet.
customer_reviews.author: MarcoinMO

customer_reviews.title: Sound fills the room
customer_reviews.text: My folks have vaulted ceilings and wood floors so they couldn't hear the TV in their living room. I bought them this sound bar and it sounds great. It was easy to connect and set up. They connected it to their Echo Dot via bluetooth so they can listen to music as well. I hadn't even considered that use for it. I understand that they can later add a sub but I don't see the point, it already sounds great. Sometimes you have to kind of mess with the input to get sound from the right place but the LED lights tell you which input you're on.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great sound bar
customer_reviews.text: I went back and forth on trying to decide which sound bar to buy. I settled on this one. The set up was pretty simple. I ran one set to my tv and another from my xbox one to the sound bar. My tv is RCA brand, the speakers on the back. It was hard to hear even turned all the way up. This sound bar fixed that. Pros: great sound! Very easy set up. Great quality for the price. Con: lack of mounting options. I couldn't mount it to the wall above the tv, no room. I currently have it sitting on the shelf directly in front of the tv.
customer_reviews.author: Ladonna H.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound on a budget
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my Sony Bravia TV and boy was I blown away by the sound. It was easy to connect to the TV. The remote needs some getting used to. But once you are able to tweak the sound to your liking, its boom! Strong bass and for a sound bar without a dedicated subwoofer, this thing is good enough. But don’t go thinking the sound output can shake your living room or home theater, this is not that imposing.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ogaronye

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 12-12-18 and two months later... dead. Powers on but will not take input from any connection. Bought this to suppliment my kitchen Samsung TV so was not looking to spend a lot, but I learned a lession in sound bar quality. We'll see how Vizio handles the return.
customer_reviews.author: William White

customer_reviews.title: Standard sound bar and reliable Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a housewarming/birthday gift without having used this model myself. I love soundbars for the increased range and tone they can give a small home entertainment system. It's nothing like a full stereo & speaker setup but it's fine for most people who stream movies and music. The recipient was able to figure out how to connect to Bluetooth pretty easily and regularly uses it to stream her podcasts while working in the living room. This is the soundbar I'd buy if I didn't already have one that's in good working order.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to supply sound for my Roku. I usually send the audio signal through my Denon Receiver. My receiver is old, from before blue tooth speakers old. So it is no surprise that I find this speaker inferior to the six plus a sub woofer I usually hear TV through. Okay, now it is June 5 2020, and it does not work. Tried the trouble shooting suggestions on Vizio's website, and at various forums. No joy. Buy something else, this speaker is junk.
customer_reviews.author: Obsidian

customer_reviews.title: A challange
customer_reviews.text: Quite an improvement in quality of sound over TV speakers projecting to the wall. Ability to adjust treble and bass to your preference excellent. There were some frustrating challenges figuring out how to get it to communicate when switching from cable to TV apps and I was never able to get sound control to transfer to FIOS or Samsung TV remotes and because of this have to use two remotes. Also when turning the TV back on I have to turn the sound bar on also.
customer_reviews.author: Country gal

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Sound
customer_reviews.text: I took a while to find someone to install the sound bar. I'm got this b/c my new TV had a bit of a tinny sound and sometimes background music drowned out voices. This product has overcame both problems. I'm no audiophile by any means but there is a very noticeable improvement. I don't listen to music on this...just tv so I don't know what someone with an ear for music would think. My son in law was so impressed that he's going to get his own.
customer_reviews.author: Pat M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sound bar for a smaller screen and smaller room. Love the cords it comes with too!
customer_reviews.text: This ia a great value. It definitely upgraded the sound quality and helped me to enjoy watching programs. It also helps me to hear what people are saying without having to turn up the volume too high. The remote is very nice and even has a "Need help?" sticker on the back. The cords included are the bonus! I love this product and definitely recommend for someone needing a smaller sound bar.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Never Buying Vizio
customer_reviews.text: Vizio would not honor their initial warranty replacement coverage for this defective soundbar. Amazon was super helpful to assist refund. Vizio backpedaled from their supervisor and subsequent reps. Disappointed in Vizio, Amazon was absolute professional in assistance and handling.
customer_reviews.author: azindn

customer_reviews.title: Quits after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased 2 of these units in last year. Both quit after 6 months. Avoid at all costs because you pack up and ship 20 dollars and wait to get another POS back. Called Vizio customer service got the total rn around . Finally gave up they just keep saying try this change this no intrest in fixing unit.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Optical audio cable was simple and perfectly easy - and all else great.
customer_reviews.text: Despite what I've read about problems w this or that, this whole thing was very easy, works very well, and is very well priced. Also, I was concerned about good quality bass with the midrange. That also is just about as good as you could hope for. Don't expect $3000 tower speakers to be endangered. But for any home theatre need, this is enough to stay clear/balanced at an obnoxious volume.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Lopez

customer_reviews.title: I can hear my TV clearly now!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my what a difference this soundbar makes to your TV. I thought my TV sound was bad, but boy I had no idea until good sound came through this thing. Its got a great sound for such a small thing. It doesn't "look" that large although it is. Its a very good design in that its sleek. I wish it had HDMI or USB connectivity - I thought it did, but it doesn't. But I connect it with the red and white plug colors and its very clear and had almost an HD style setting that's quite deep- I like it for sporting or movies nights. Easy to install and clear directions helped.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: First soundbar purchase, was not disappointed. Quality is impressive for the price.
customer_reviews.text: In comparison to my flat screen TV speakers, the sound is night and day. If you haven't had a soundbar before then I would recommend this for its quality and price. Not quite a surround sound speaker but it does the job well. Bass and treble are noticeably better than the TV itself, but the bass is not overpowering by any means. Adding a subwoofer would be necessary for bass lovers. I became a snob after turning the soundbar off, as I said, "what is this garbage" to the TV speakers. Good stuff. Only negative was the shipping debacle that took roughly a week longer than quoted, but worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: Max Kramsky

customer_reviews.title: Buy the current year's model, not C6, get D6
customer_reviews.text: The C6 was DOA. I contacted Vizio Support, they walked through some rudimentary troubleshooting to confirm my findings, then got me on the warranty replacement track. The process to get a warranty replacement is a pita, as it involves several emails and phone calls I either needed to respond to or make. However, the replacement arrived in two days, model D6, a newer version and it is PHENOMENAL. Setup took ten seconds and the sound is AMAZING.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Krause

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I got this one to replace the same exact model I had. I moved and the movers broke my old one. Could have got a different one but I love this model. Perfect for an apartment. You can customize the sound by adjusting treble and bass and HD sound setting. Bluetooth is simple as well. It’s really worth having especially for the price you can’t beat it. Quality at an affordable price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and useful in various situations
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very happy with this sound bar. One of the reviews that suggested plugging in to the direct tv box was useful. It made set up very quick. It’s nice to have the option to turn it on or not. If I’m the only one watching tv, I don’t need a sound bar but when the family is over, then it’s useful. Also when my father is visiting, it helps him hear better even with his hearing aids. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: J.A.

customer_reviews.title: Works well except for Bluetooth pairing issue
customer_reviews.text: That unit works well, and sounds very good. But it has one fatal flaw. If you miss the volume button, the Bluetooth button is just above it. It is very easy to accidentally put the unit in Bluetooth pairing mode, and the designers did not come up with a way to turn that mode back to normal. So you end up having to completely restore the factory defaults, which is not terribly difficult, but it is annoying
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Solid performer at this price point - eco minded
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a sound bar to improve the sound quality for the TV in my office and this fit the bill. I love the variety of audio input options, supporting a variety of connectors and quality. I appreciate that the volume control works well and provides much more volume compared to the TV by itself - even more so, now that I have an Apple TV 4K as my source for media, having cut the cable cord for media content. If it doesn't sense audio, it turns off on it's own - and it works well with my HD TV and the Apple TV 4K.
customer_reviews.author: WileEC

customer_reviews.title: awesome sound
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my girlfriend's house. She loves it and so do I. Was able to program her comcast remote so no need for an extra remote. I have an older five speaker sound system and it rivals it. Most likely going to get one for my mother. Also, we have been using this sound bar for about seven months without issue.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: VIZIO SB2920-C6 29-Inch 2.0
customer_reviews.text: As with most of the new flat screen tv's today, my speakers sucked. We would turn it up to 100% just to watch TV in our bedroom. I made a direct connection via the supplied cable. Now we have more sound than we can stand. 50% is the max we can use it at. My wife and I both like that she can still use her blue tooth headphones and not disturb me if I'm sleeping. A bonus is that we can control the volume and on/off with our Viacom remote. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Placement of buttons on remote is a hassle.
customer_reviews.text: This works, the sounds quality is ok and far better than what the TV had. My biggest complaint is the placement of the buttons on the remote control. The blue tooth button is right next to the power button. If you hit the blue tooth button, it of course is trying to connect with a blue tooth device and the sound on the TV stop. Then you have to use the input button to find the TV sound again which can take some fiddling with in order to get the TV sound again. Just annoying as I hit the bluetooth button too often.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Vizio soundbar. The first was sounded great and was easy to hook up. This soundbar is every bit as good as the original that was knocked out in a thunderstorm. The sound is very good and hookup was easy. when reading reviews on other units a problem was mentioned that the unit was shutdown after a certain time. I bought one of them and it shut down after 2 hours not when it was idle. Back it went to Amazon. This unit will shutdown only when not in use, which is what it should do. Pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: Sound went to crap just after my return window ended
customer_reviews.text: Just over one month after purchase, suddenly the sound went all static-y. Worse than just the normal TV speakers. I reached out to Amazon and would have to pay a restocking fee so I reached out to Vizio directly. I've talked to their tech support 3 times to do power resets and factory resets. Nothing is working. Now I have to submit at warranty request to them. Seems pretty ridiculous for a product that is supposed to have great reviews.
customer_reviews.author: alexis

customer_reviews.title: Really good sound over your normal LCD
customer_reviews.text: Great bang for your buck! This is a low cost upgrade to the lcd. I wish I bought it years ago...this thin speaker has a lot of capabilities and sound. I don’t need a subwoofer with this. I just had the friends over for a party and everyone had a lot of fun connecting to in via Bluetooth to play their playlist. I’ll be buying another one for my bedroom and basement tv room.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M T

customer_reviews.title: Solid sound for low low price!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to upgrade my audio solution for my TV and was searching for a good soundbar that wouldn't break the bank. I came across this Vizio soundbar and decided I would give it a try. I have had it for almost a year now and it has been amazing. The sound quality is great compared to the sound quality on the built-in speakers on many TVs on the market. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan C.

customer_reviews.title: best small sound bar
customer_reviews.text: This was the best 80 dollars I ever spent. New Samsung smart tv, but the audio was terrible. This little Vizio is great audio and also pairs up easily with the Comcast X-1 remote control so you only have to use your comcast remote which will also turn off and on your sound bar when you turn off the tv. I, highly reccomend this Vizio sound bar.
customer_reviews.author: anthony dayotis

customer_reviews.title: Tight sound, GREAT price!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an audiophile, but I have a good ear and a pretty decent mid-rung(and old) Yamaha setup in the living room. We purchased this for the bedroom after reading the good reviews. I have to say I am very impressed. The tech seems to be getting better all of the time, and the sound field this thing creates is really, really nice. I imagine if paired with a decent sub, you would have a tight little movie watching experience. It's pretty darn good without it just for TV watching, Amazon, Netflix, etc. Honestly, you can't go wrong here. Save some bucks and get this. It's a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: ZankFrappa

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SOUND AND EASY TO INSTALL.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I live in an apartment and the sound comes from the back of a flat screen TV. I didn't want my TV to be too loud for them, and wanted the sound to come from the front. It not only keeps the TV noise on my side of the wall, but the sound quality is excellent and rich now. It was also easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Rice

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay connected to any audio source
customer_reviews.text: I've tried connecting this to 2 different TVs with the same problem - it keeps losing the input. I've tried the optical and RCA connections and neither works reliably. I've tried two different televisions with the same results. Finally gave it to a friends son as a bluetooth speaker and even that drops off periodically an he has to cycle power to the unit to get it to connect again.
customer_reviews.author: java paladin

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: Product stops working for days at a time. I have tried connecting my TV (which is also a Vizio) many different ways and it continues to fail. I’m very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Good But
customer_reviews.text: The sound bar seems fine but the remote is small, hard to read and impossible to decipher. We are not all 20 year olds with perfect sight and knowledge of symbols. The guide with small print is no help. Wish I could but a better remote.
customer_reviews.author: mbrarian

customer_reviews.title: Static after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: The product started out great. But after three months of moderate use, there is static each time it is turned on now. Unusable after under a year.
customer_reviews.author: S Nor

customer_reviews.title: Poor Vizio customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Optical audio cable did not work. Called Vizio and after going through the troubleshooting process they told me to get another cable. When I asked them about reimbursement or for them to send a new one they refused. Works with the RCA cable supplied. And I am connecting to a Vizio TV. Poor customer service. I am still debating returning back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Curler1

customer_reviews.title: Instant movie theater...just add HD t.v. !
customer_reviews.text: The movie theater quality far exceeded expectations, especially for such a compact sound bar. The richness, fullness, and deepness in base and treble blows me away, with terrific real-life stereo effect. A great compliment to the 50" HD tv....awesome !!! Easy to mix the treble, bass., volume, as well...
customer_reviews.author: H. Perr.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price but great support
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice sound bar for the price. I have to use the visio remote to adjust the sound because it will not integrate with my 2015 model samsung tv. I am using it in my gym so not use a lot or many adjustments. I did call support and was pleasantly surprised to get US based support person. It was great to not have to deal with an accent and lack of understanding. The guy was very patient and understood the product. He walk me through several attempts to get this to work on the samsung remote before suggesting to call samsung. Very pleased with support.
customer_reviews.author: DoubleL

customer_reviews.title: Good product with a little peculiarity
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for hubby and we like it. It gets really loud and is easy to set up. There are way more features that we don’t use. We just have it hooked up to the tv. We don’t use it as a Bluetooth speaker although my son tried it out and it was easy to set up. The only thing I don’t like is if I have a show paused for a while, when I turn it back on the sound doesn’t turn back on. I have to turn it up and down to get it to come back to life.
customer_reviews.author: ElisaT

customer_reviews.title: Great value sound bar
customer_reviews.text: I specifically purchased this for adding a speaker set up under an ultra-wide 43" computer monitor. I actually sounds very good for the money. I also utilize the passthrough for the subwoofer as well and it works very well. Just turn off the energy saving feature so that it wont suddenly auto turn off, and it should work like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: J. Allgood

customer_reviews.title: Fortunately, I found the solution in the troubleshooting section
customer_reviews.text: This soundbar exceeded my expectations. The setup was a bit difficult, because you had to deal with the flashing light pairs on the left side of the bar to know which connection you were using at the time. You also have to make sure you are using PCM for the audio. I originally had my audio set to Dolby Digital, so the soundbar did not work with that. Fortunately, I found the solution in the troubleshooting section. Additionally, the soundbar allows for bluetooth connections, which is an additional plus. I purchased this soundbar for a television I mounted in the kitchen, that did not have good quality sound. This soundbar, for the price, exceeded my expectations. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working great!
customer_reviews.text: My old crappy TV speakers just were not cutting it. I bought this as a replacement, even after seeing some of the reviews. For 80 bucks I'm extremely happy with the performance of this little unit. I have had it for I wanna say about 2 months now with no issues. Plugged in and worked right away. The only thing is, DO NOT LOSE THE MAUAL, IT'S IMPOSSIBLE TO NAVIGATE THE DIFFERENT SOUND INPUTS WITHOUT IT.
customer_reviews.author: Balto

customer_reviews.title: Great option for seniors
customer_reviews.text: My mom swears this is the best thing. She installed it during the Covid crisis, we could not help but she said it simply plugged into TV. She says the sound is loud- she has no clue about bass or audio quality. This truly is a game changer for her quality of life during Covid shut in time.
customer_reviews.author: C Falt

customer_reviews.title: 29 inch Version is Wife approved!
customer_reviews.text: This is for the 29 inch version. My setup is Samsung 32 inch tv, Direct TV Genie remote. I connected to the digital coax out on the DTV box and programmed the DTV box remote to Visio for audio out from DTV. Optical connected to tv for built in Netflix. The DTV remote now controls the soundbar just fine. The Soundbar comes on as soon as the tv/Genie is powered on and it goes off after a little while if Eco mode is set to on (default). Bluetooth to my Samsung S5 works fine. My wife said it sounds great, so wife approved is good enough for me! Sure beats the tinny tv speakers and great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: A.Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup but optical connection quit
customer_reviews.text: I am retired from one of the largest tech corporations in the world. So I am well versed on product features, trouble shooting, and setup. Overall for the money, a good product. In my case, the optical install quit working after about 15 minutes. Instead of getting in the weeds with trouble shooting that, I opted for the fall back RCA install. Works great. It was nice to have that option available with cables ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Bo P.

customer_reviews.title: A Good Item for Us
customer_reviews.text: There isn't any objective way to compare this sound bar with others, but for our needs and room, it has been excellent for years. We have changed TV's (Vizio and Westinghouse), and it worked nicely with both. Reliability is therefore great. Sound is plentiful, and base is good. I'd recommend it to anyone except a demanding audiophile.
customer_reviews.author: Luis F. Moreno

customer_reviews.title: This sound bar paired wonderfully with my Vizio TV
customer_reviews.text: This sound bar paired wonderfully with my Vizio TV, and has dramatically improved the sound quality. I was having reverberation issues from the TV which have stopped completely with the addition of my sound bar. The remote is easy to use, and all of my other remotes synced with the sound bar without me doing anything. The only issue that I've had over time is that dust collects on the speaker foam and it's really hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel K.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price, would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: It's not an expensive sound bar, but it works pretty well for what it is. I'm using it for the TV in my garage for sports and music. For that application it works pretty well and was a huge improvement from the stock vizio speakers that are in the TV.
customer_reviews.author: 31NDUN

customer_reviews.title: It was cheap and provides good sound (definitely an improvement from my TV)
customer_reviews.text: I saw a lot of mixed reviews on this item. It was cheap and provides good sound (definitely an improvement from my TV). Two of the complaints I saw I would agree with. First, you do have to use the remote for this sound bar in order to get sound from your TV once it is hooked up (but as long as you are not a person who loses remotes, that should not be too big of an issue). Also, the cords they included with the product did not work with my TV. I had to purchase an HDMI cable, which is fine and was easy to hook up.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Graf

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and easy setup. All cables and accessories included.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy setup. Good sound with wide volume range. The volume steps could be a bit finer. When watching TV alone in a quiet room the sound seems either too low or a bit too loud between two steps. It looks great and comes with all cables you will need. I connected my tv through fiber link cable. Worked right away. Also comes with wall mounting hardware that I didn't use.
customer_reviews.author: Oregontrailmike

customer_reviews.title: So so soundbar
customer_reviews.text: Is a decent bar, twice as loud as the tv speakers but don’t go thinking this is in any way a performance bar. I bought this because it was the only soundbar on amazon that has a sub output port and no sub. Paired this with a klipsch 10” sub and have a performance sounding system at a quarter of the price. This bar does a good job with mids and highs but it’s bass by itself is almost non existent. It works with LG remote signals out of the box so if you have a LG tv this would pair perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up, sounds great, and better than I thought for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and includes wall mount if so desired with template for easy placement. The sound is really good. The trouble I had with my TV was that I would have to turn it up to 100 just to hear it proper. Now with the Vizio sound bar, that is no longer an issue. The clarity is quite good. It syncs to my i-phone and i-pad for music as well. As inexpensive as this is, I was worried that it would not perform, but that is not the case. Performance with a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: PeterTheGreat

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work with the TV remote
customer_reviews.text: Had to use the sound bar remote to adjust volume, TV remote wouldn't do it. Pain in the........ Recommend buying the same brand as your TV. We returned this one and bought a Samsung, which operates with the TV remote.
customer_reviews.author: Gale

customer_reviews.title: Sounds excellent and was a significant upgrade to our crappy samsung ...
customer_reviews.text: Sounds excellent and was a significant upgrade to our crappy samsung built-in speakers. That said, when watching movies and some tv shows with multiple audio channels, the soundtrack/BG music can be much louder than the voices, which is annoying, since there are no advanced equalization or audio customization options.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Good Speaker that will give you a much better sound experience with any TV.
customer_reviews.text: As one of the cheapest Sound Bars on Amazon I decided to get one to replace my recently broken surround sound system without paying a fortune for a new one. Pros: + Very easy to setup + Bluetooth (wireless streaming) music from your smartphone to the soundbar was very simple to figure out + It's visually appealing in front of my TV + sound is FAR superior than my TV speakers which I won't use again + ability to adjust the treble and base + Easy to use remote control included with batteries - Bass could be improved
customer_reviews.author: Taylor M.

customer_reviews.title: Works intermittently
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great but will only play for extras or trailer, is not playing with the actual movie. Update 6-1-20 The tech support listed in the back of the remote was immensely helpful. Apparently I have a bad cable so they are replacing the device for me. 6/15 update: the replacement they sent me won’t turn on. I gave them 2 stars for exceptional customer support but if it doesn’t work it doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: For any affordable sound bar, I will always do Vizio. I had a 20 inch one already. This one is solid and dependable. The lights to signify what connection it is set on is confusing and an odd design, but overall harmless. And the bluetooth connection only sometimes hiccups, but for most part have not had trouble connecting to my devices. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mistakan

customer_reviews.title: Good, could be slightly better.
customer_reviews.text: I’m only having one issue, the advanced sound button on the lower left hand side of the remote, it feels like it fades in and out of high quality sound to normal. Really weird Other than that so far so good after a week. Came with two mounting brackets, kinda easy to install if you are talking about having it perfectly level. Kinda tricky
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Good and Bad
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound bar! The sound quality is awesome, it's rich and vivid. I cannot stress how good this sound bar sounds. The bad is 100% because of the "remote" and I put quotes on the word remote because it's horrible. Even with brand new batteries you have to stand within a few feet of the sound bar to manipulate it with the remote. Even at that range it's difficult! After a year of swearing at the remote I should throw it away and just use the buttons on the sound bar.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Barnes

customer_reviews.title: This little speaker is awesome! Its smaller than a lot of the speakers ...
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker is awesome! Its smaller than a lot of the speakers I saw when I was shopping around which I like.The sound is amazing on it. My fiance is a music producer so watching TV and actually hearing it is a problem for me sometimes. I bought this to combat his noise and it works, I couldn't be happier! No more guessing what people are saying! It took me a few minutes to hook up, there are a few different ways you can do it and it was pretty much trial and error until I found what sounded best for our set up. I highly recommend this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Goncalves

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: It works well, and solved our issue of having to turn the TV sound way up - our TV doesn't have a wall behind it so there was nothing to reflect sound back into the living room. Plenty of options to connect it to your TV, I'm using the optical connection but there is HDMI, component, etc. The only reason I can't give it 4 stars is because the difference between sound levels is...rather large. I wish it had more levels - it can be so quiet it's hard to hear, but the next level is far too loud.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get the sound to work through the RCA jacks, but that may have been a problem with the tv. The bluetooth worked perfectly though.
customer_reviews.author: Jason B.

customer_reviews.title: Gave us issues after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: I gave this a great review at first, however now I regret getting this sound bar so much. It started off by not connecting, then it would keep turning off after an hour of using it, the lights on the front didn’t help with anything, it now does not work, just a horrible buzz, and it’s overall just terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty

customer_reviews.title: Does not function correctly, sound is awful
customer_reviews.text: The bluetooth does not work at all. The audio cord also does not work. Only the hdmi/usb work. The sound is worse than my 20 year old Volvo's stereo. DO NOT BUY. Sadly, I missed the return date or I would be returning this. It is an $80 paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Ravert

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Since it has arrived I have had problems. It took me over an hour just to get it to work and that includes chatting with tech support( I was working from at the time and couldn’t call) they couldn’t help me and ended up leaving the chat! I finally got it to work by myself. Well the remote stops working even with new batteries and it will randomly stop playing sound no matter what you do. It is just a crappy product.
customer_reviews.author: APRIL

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast, especially for the price. The only 'downaode' I've noticed is that the directions for switching the sound quality is a smidge confusing and there's not really any difference anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: We paid a small fortune for an outdoor tv that had a great picture but really poor sound. The Vizio soundbar solved the problem at a reasonable cost. Hard to believe the volume range it puts out with high quality sound. Mounting brackets and template made it very easy to hang on the wall below the tv. Very happy with the Vizio soundbar purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sparty Fan

customer_reviews.title: Needs a lighted remote
customer_reviews.text: I installed this on my Samsung TV in my bedroom. In the dark you cannot find the buttons and I would like it to have a lighted remote. Sound quality is OK but it does not always detect the audio from the TV when you first start. Last night I could not get it to work when I switched from Xfinity TV to Amazon Prime video. I could not remember the button to use to reprogram.
customer_reviews.author: ww2

customer_reviews.title: OK  Soundbar .. better than the TV Sound.  Very poor volume control
customer_reviews.text: This unit actually has pretty decent sound for it's size and price range. The problem is the volume control. Seems instead of infinite range from off to full volume, there are built in "stops" or levels.. In my living room, the sound is either too soft.. or next click up it's too loud. I just can't figure it out. Makes no difference if I use the VIZIO remote or my Harmony remote. It's not good.. too loud.. or can't hear..
customer_reviews.author: Home shopping savant.

customer_reviews.title: My Mother In Law Loved This
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install and sync with her cable remote. She has slight hearing loss and it has enhanced her hearing pleasure greatly. It helps make words more distinct. It probably isn't for very large tvs, rooms, or someone that wants high end with a woofer. But for her use, or for a second tv etc, it's excellent.
customer_reviews.author: LaLa

customer_reviews.title: Great but Bluetooth needed with firestick
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far but we have issues with firestick connection to it. We have to use Bluetooth connection in order to use with the Firestick. My husband looked it up and it seems to be a known issue. Sound quality is good and size was not bad. Vizio is usually a pretty soild brand for us.
customer_reviews.author: Brie Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sound Bar
customer_reviews.text: I added this to my 40 in. Visio smart t v and the sound quality is really great !! An awesome addition to enhance t v sound , great for Youtube music videos. You will be happy to have one !!
customer_reviews.author: ZEB

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound Bar!
customer_reviews.text: I mounted the sound bar upside down, therefore having access to the controls on the devices. I purchased a separate sound bar mounting kit, that said these kits will vary. I got lucky getting a manageable bracket for the sound bar, this sound bar is a great product that adds on supporting audio to my new flat screen. The sound bar did come with a mounting kit, it was for wall mounting. My goal was to mount under the flat screen.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Gerardo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bar sound
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bar sound! Excellent sound, bass effect and clear tones. I use it in a bedroom 15 x 16. I bought it to replace my mothers computer speaker. I decided to get a bar, to simplify the desk multi speaker system- 2 side speakers and floor bass, too many cables around. Simple connection with computer- AC cable included!!! plus comes with a remote control. Also includes an fiber optic cable, AC cable and digital cable. Why buy computer speakers when you can get better deal with a sound bar! My mom is very happy with the sound, and I am too.
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Roman

product_meta.title: VIZIO SB2920-C6 29-Inch 2.0 Channel Sound Bar,Black
product_meta.description: The all-new VIZIO 29" 2.0 Sound Bar offers amazing audio in a compact size. Its sophisticated new design makes it an attractive addition to any 32"+ class TV. Use Bluetooth to stream music from your smartphone, tablet or computer. With everything you need for a quick and easy setup, upgrading to an amazing home theater experience has never been easier - plug the Sound Bar in, connect it to your TV, sit back and enjoy. The 2.0 Sound Bar features two powerful full-range stereo speakers that boost your audio and deliver amazing sound. Streamlined Design VIZIO Sound Bars are crafted to accentuate your TV with a minimalist body style that blends in with any room of your home. VIZIO Sound Bars utilize DTS audio technologies to deliver elevated multi-channel audio for the most immersive sound quality.
feature_bullets: 95 dB of room filling, crystal clear sound with less than 1% total harmonic distortion; Sound Bar Frequency: 70 Hertz – 19 KHertz
Built in Bluetooth lets you lose the wires and listen to your music with a tap of a finger
Easy upgrade that boosts sound with a powerful punch
Premium audio with DTS Studio SoundTM, DTS Tru Volume TM and DTS TruSurroundTM
Easy Setup: Connect the Sound Bar to your TV using 1 of the included cables; Refer user manual for troubleshooting steps.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars4,994 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
